W03_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W03_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_000_DETAIL.text: You found a world shrouded in darkness on the other side of the door. Perhaps you can acquire a spirit's power if you let Dolores guide you.
